text: Jevick Macfarlane is a Saint Lucian footballer who currently plays for Uptown Rebels in the SLFA First Division and the Saint Lucia national team. == International career == On 7 September 2018, Macfarlane made his full international debut for Saint Lucia, in a 2019–20 CONCACAF Nations League qualifying match against Antigua and Barbuda. Macfarlane scored in the match. === International goals === :Scores and results list Saint Lucia's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" |- ! # !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !!
